itemDescription: English rugby union and rugby league footballer (1927-2018)

wikipedia_page.main: Gerry Lowe (16 November 1927 – 2 March 2018) was an English rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1940s and 1950s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Warrington RUFC and club level rugby League (RL) for Warrington (Heritage No. 516), and Keighley, as a prop or second-row.

response: * Gerry Lowe (1927–2018), English rugby union and rugby league footballer
*Gerry Lowe, 90, English rugby player (Warrington Wolves).Warrington Wolves' last champion Gerry Lowe dies aged 90
